name: Air Jordan 12 Stealth
desc: The Air Jordan 12 is the return of Tinker Hatfield’s celebrated ’96 design—the first to bring Zoom Air cushioning to the signature line.

name: BLAZER MID NATURE
desc: Styled for the ’70s. Loved in the ’80s. Classic in the ’90s. Ready for the future. The Nike Blazer Mid ’77 Next Nature now delivers a timeless design made from at least 20% recycled materials by weight.

name: AIR MAX
desc: Strap a little sunshine to your feet with the Nike Air Max 90 SE. Carefree details and fresh colors deliver a beach day forecast.

name: AIR MAX PENNY ONE
desc: Paying tribute to basketball icon Penny Hardaway, the Nike Air Max Penny is a near exact replica of the hoops original. From its jeweled Swoosh to the wing piping on the sides, these original details celebrate both your retro style and a b-ball legend.

name: AIR MAX 90
desc: Strap a little sunshine to your feet with the Nike Air Max 90 SE. Carefree details and fresh colors deliver a beach day forecast.

name: AIR MAX TERRASCAPE
desc: The new outsole design features translucent Nike Grind rubber and wraps onto the mudguard for added durability. Breathable mesh on the upper keeps it airy and lightweight while overlays on the sides add toughness that can handle streets or trails.

name: AIR JORDAN 3
desc: It’s the return of a legend: The Tinker Hatfield design that solidified MJ’s relationship with Nike is back with a clean white upper that’s energised by flashes of Dark Iris.

name: MIRAGE MOX VISION
desc: The Mirage Mox collection takes design cues from a 1970s pair of PUMA running shoes and transforms them with a textural contrast and funky futuristic elements.

name: SUEDE MAYU RAW
desc: This fashion-forward twist on the iconic Suede shoe is a little rough around the edges – and that’s how we like it.

name: MIRAGE MOX VISION
desc: The Mirage Mox collection takes design cues from a 1970s pair of PUMA running shoes and transforms them with a textural contrast and funky futuristic elements.

name: FUTURE RIDER
desc: Break the mould in style in the vibrant Future Rider Icons. These striking trainers are a nod to PUMA’s heritage, bringing a fresh, 21st-century feel to the iconic 1980s Fast Rider model.

name: RS-2K INTERNET
desc: Experience a paradigm shift in athletic technology. Our RS-2K Internet Exploring is delves into today’s digital narratives in physical form.

name: RS-FAST
desc: Sometimes fashion just looks fast. These sci-fi-inspired trainers are bold and colourful because their nostalgic, retro design notes optimistically point to better days ahead.

name: LEATHER LEGACY
desc: It began as a running shoe in 1983, but soon the Classic Leather became an everyday footwear choice.

name: VECTOR RED FOOTWEAR
desc: Shift your perspective and rewrite the past. These OG Reebok shoes prove that even the best things can be altered. Stitched-on lines and a slightly off Union Jack logo give these shoes a new look.

name: CLASSIC LEATHER CARDI
desc: Challenging proportions and design, these Classic Leather Cardi B V2 women’s shoes combine iconic DNA with modernity, boldness and shine.
